name: Mr Maker 3D Level Editor
description:
Mr Maker 3D Level Editor is a platform game, with a level maker. Inspired by the games of the 90s, but with a touch of modernity. There are some levels ready to play, the coolest is right below.

Create Your Own Levels

You can create your levels however you like, add blocks, traps, enemies, coins, create bridges, stairs and more.
As you gain experience, you’ll experience higher, creative and challenging levels.

Team Creation

Increase the fun by calling friends and family to create a level together.

History - The Magic Hammer

The oldest builders in the Mr Maker 3D world. They say that there is a magic hammer, capable of building or destroying anything.
But if used for evil, it can make a planet disappear.

Items

Boomerang hammer, which will help Mr Maker to defeat enemies and collect coins from a distance.
A great help!

Gamepad

It is more enjoyable to play using a Gamepad (Joystick).
